text: Allah vanopa muenzaniso wemurume (muranda) ane madzimambo akawanda anopikisana (sekunge avo vanonamata vamwe pamwechete naAllah), nemurume anongova namambo mumwe chete (sekunge avo vanonamata Allah chete). Vakafanana here vaviri ava mumuenzaniso wavo? Kurumbidzwa kwose ndekwaAllah! Asi vazhinji vavo havazivi
